attributes.action: Is the coalition government fit for purpose
attributes.additional_details: With high vat rates, increasing fuel duties, broken promises on university fees, alteration in planning rules which disadvantage communities and benefit wind farm developers, adverse legislation against benefit claimants a failure to deal (as promised) with rogue bankers and a general fascist method of governing is the coalition fit for purpose, or do we now need a new prime minister who will listen and respond to voting public as opposed to wealthy public schoolboys. We ask the government to debate the dissolution of the coalition and the appointment of a more capable prime minister as a matter of urgency
